page.title: 18CREDITS.
page.content:
We would like to{thank}all the people of Uckfield who have helped us write up our project,{particularly;
Mr Grant and Mr Grant,Mr Hughs, Mr Tebbitt and Mrs Thomas our farmers.
The mayor, Mr Foster and Mrs Stocker, the town clerk.
Mr F.C. Cooper for his memories.
Mrs Cowper for her help on the woodlands.
The parents of children in classes 14,15 and 16 of{Manor C.P.Primary.
Lastly but certainly not least, the teachers and members of classes 14,15 and 16 who have undertaken this work with great intent.
